interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: I AM
Review Date: 2016/03/29
Store: Tom Shadyac  (Actor, Director),     Thom Hartmann  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'I AM is the story of a successful Hollywood director, Tom Shadyac (LIAR LIAR, NUTTY PROFESSOR, BRUCE ALMIGHTY), who experienced a life threatening head injury, and his ensuing journey to try and answer two very basic questions:  What s wrong with our world? and What can we do about it? With a film crew of four, Tom visits some of today s great minds, including authors, poets, teachers, religious leaders, and scientists (Howard Zinn, Lynn McTaggart, Desmond Tutu, Thom Harmann, Coleman Barks) searching for the fundamental endemic problem that causes all of the other problems, while simultaneously reflecting on this own life choices of excess, greed and eventual healing. We started by asking what s wrong wit the world, and ended up discovering what s right with it. Tom Shadyac', 'Review', "'Amazing...' --Ellen DegeneresEveryone needs to see this film! --Bruce Cohen, Academy Award Winning Producer (American Beauty)Entertaining and enlightening. The I AM Documentary is a spark of light and a work of love. --Marianne Williamson, New York Times Best Seller"]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Thom Hartmann, Tom Shadyac', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 18 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '05-58876', 'Director': 'Tom Shadyac', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 18 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tom Shadyac, Thom Hartmann', 'Studio': 'Gaiam - Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I really like this although you can argue some of what is presented.  The message is positive and uplifting,  Can you ask more?

reference_summary:
American Hustle
Drama, Strange, Fun, Serious
['From the director of Silver Linings Playbook and The Fighter, AMERICAN HUSTLE is outrageously entertaining and one of the most acclaimed films of the year.']
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Russell'], 'Producers': ['Charles Roven', 'Richard Suckle', 'Megan Ellison', 'Jonathan Gordon'], 'Starring': ['Christian Bale', 'Bradley Cooper', 'Amy Adams']}
I didn't like it.....it was a great story and could have  been intense and exciting.  Instead, it was hokey.  Just not my cup of tea.
Hokey
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English'], 'Directors': ['Stephen Gyllenhaal', 'Billy Gierhart', 'Ray McKinnon', 'Nicole Kassell', 'Jim McKay', 'Scott Teems', 'Keith Gordon', 'Romeo Tirone', 'Andrew Bernstein', 'Dennie Gordon'], 'Producers': ['Mark Johnson', 'Melissa Bernstein', 'Ray McKinnon'], 'Studio': ['Sundance', 'AMC Plus Drama']}
One of the most compelling dramas I've ever seen on tv.  The study of a man who has been in prison for 20 yrs. and then tries to readjust to "normalcy" outside the confines of the prison, is in-depth, smart, and compelling - sorry for the use of that adjective again.
smart, and compelling - sorry for the use of ...

Dickerson', 'Patrick Cady', 'Aaron Lipstadt', 'Kevin Dowling', 'Adam Davidson', 'Daisy von Scherler Mayer', 'Tim Hunter', 'Christine Moore', 'Zetna Fuentes'], 'Producers': ['Eric Overmyer', 'Michael Connelly', 'Henrik Bastin', 'Pieter Jan Brugge'], 'Starring': ['タイタス・ウェリバー', 'ジェイミー・へクター', 'エイミー・アキノ'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']}
Like the character, the writing, the story.....really fun.
Four Stars
I AM

['Product Description', 'I AM is the story of a successful Hollywood director, Tom Shadyac (LIAR LIAR, NUTTY PROFESSOR, BRUCE ALMIGHTY), who experienced a life threatening head injury, and his ensuing journey to try and answer two very basic questions:  What s wrong with our world? and What can we do about it? With a film crew of four, Tom visits some of today s great minds, including authors, poets, teachers, religious leaders, and scientists (Howard Zinn, Lynn McTaggart, Desmond Tutu, Thom Harmann, Coleman Barks) searching for the fundamental endemic problem that causes all of the other problems, while simultaneously reflecting on this own life choices of excess, greed and eventual healing. We started by asking what s wrong wit the world, and ended up discovering what s right with it. Tom Shadyac', 'Review', "'Amazing...' --Ellen DegeneresEveryone needs to see this film! --Bruce Cohen, Academy Award Winning Producer (American Beauty)Entertaining and enlightening. The I AM Documentary is a spark of light and a work of love. --Marianne Williamson, New York Times Best Seller"]
